description:
A http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk] as leader of the "ghouls", a criminal organization in "Heaven`s Hole" (a lower district of Tokyo).
He orders the ghouls to attack the http://anidb.net/ch25724 [Mobile Police Squad] of Tokyo until the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] intervenes.
name: Varex Manavidan
